Entries.DialogueText: Oh, good morning Mr. {Farmer_Name}!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, good morning Mr. !

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, good morning Ms. {Farmer_Name}!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, good morning Ms. !

Entries.DialogueText: I hope it's not too early... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope it's not too early...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I just wanted to stop by and thank you in person for all the wonderful artifacts and minerals you've discovered... you've done so much for one person! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I just wanted to stop by and thank you in person for all the wonderful artifacts and minerals you've discovered... you've done so much for one person!

Entries.DialogueText: In fact, I've just received a letter from the office of the regional secretary of artifacts... We're being honored with the coveted 'golden shovel' award for our significant contributions to the field!
Entries.DisplayPattern: In fact, I've just received a letter from the office of the regional secretary of artifacts... We're being honored with the coveted 'golden shovel' award for our significant contributions to the field!

Entries.DialogueText: And it's all thanks to you! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: And it's all thanks to you!

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I should let you get back to your work...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I should let you get back to your work...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! I almost forgot!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! I almost forgot!

Entries.DialogueText: I have a gift for you... It's an old key that's been sealed in the museum vault for at least 100 years. It's a little rusty, but still beautiful. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have a gift for you... It's an old key that's been sealed in the museum vault for at least 100 years. It's a little rusty, but still beautiful.

Entries.DialogueText: You got the 'Rusty Key'! It's been added to your wallet.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You got the 'Rusty Key'! It's been added to your wallet.

Entries.DialogueText: It's about time!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's about !

Entries.DialogueText: Abysmal...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Abysmal...

Entries.DialogueText: Not a single piece in the entire collection.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not a single piece in the entire collection.

Entries.DialogueText: What's this? You found something? Let me see it!
Entries.DisplayPattern: What's this? You found something? Let me see it!

Entries.DialogueText: Remarkable!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Remarkable!

Entries.DialogueText: It's very old.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's very old.

Entries.DialogueText: I'd love to study this in greater detail... But it is yours.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd love to study this in greater detail... But it is yours.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmm...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmm...

Entries.DialogueText: I've got a favor to ask you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've got a favor to ask you.

Entries.DialogueText: Would you consider donating any new artifacts or minerals that you find?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Would you consider donating any new artifacts or minerals that you find?

Entries.DialogueText: We could make a groundbreaking discovery together!
Entries.DisplayPattern: We could make a groundbreaking discovery together!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, and who knows... If you keep donating I might come across some interesting items to send your way.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, and who knows... If you keep donating I might come across some interesting items to send your way.

Entries.DialogueText: Think about it, will you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Think about it, will you?

Entries.DialogueText: If you decide to donate, just bring the objects to the front desk.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you decide to donate, just bring the objects to the front desk.

Entries.DialogueText: 博物馆看起来太棒啦！再次感谢你的帮助。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 博物馆看起来太棒啦!再次感谢你的帮助。

Entries.DialogueText: 你似乎没有要捐给博物馆的。最好出去寻宝，哈？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你似乎没有要捐给博物馆的。最好出去寻宝,哈?

Entries.DialogueText: 你好啊！欢迎来到星露谷考古研究办公室。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好啊!欢迎来到星露谷考古研究办公室。

Entries.DialogueText: 啊……说起来怪丢人的，不过上一任馆长把所有的藏品都卷走了。我们什么可展示的工艺品也没有了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 啊......说起来怪丢人的,不过上一任馆长把所有的藏品都卷走了。我们什么可展示的工艺品也没有了。

Entries.DialogueText: 不过我希望这一点能很快得到改善！嘿，如果你在外面找到什么工艺品啊矿石啊之类的，能不能告诉我一声呢？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不过我希望这一点能很快得到改善!嘿,如果你在外面找到什么工艺品啊矿石啊之类的,能不能告诉我一声呢?

Entries.DialogueText: 找到什么了吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 找到什么了吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 挖出什么了吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 挖出什么了吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 需要我帮忙是吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 需要我帮忙是吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 你好。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好。

Entries.DialogueText: 有东西带给我是吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 有东西带给我是吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 你身上有泥土的味道……不错！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你身上有泥土的味道......不错!
